DataSource.Query: WITH cash AS ( SELECT value_date, 'Cash'::text AS payment_type, SUM(total_amount) AS amount FROM sales.sales_view WHERE COALESCE(cash_repository_id, 0) <> 0 AND value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date AND inventory.get_office_id_by_counter_id(counter_id) = @OfficeId GROUP BY value_date ), cheque AS ( SELECT value_date, 'Check'::text AS payment_type, SUM(total_amount) AS amount FROM sales.sales_view WHERE COALESCE(check_amount, 0) <> 0 AND value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date AND inventory.get_office_id_by_counter_id(counter_id) = @OfficeId GROUP BY value_date ), credit AS ( SELECT value_date, 'Credit'::text AS payment_type, SUM(total_amount) AS amount FROM sales.sales_view WHERE is_credit AND value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date AND inventory.get_office_id_by_counter_id(counter_id) = @OfficeId GROUP BY value_date ) SELECT value_date, payment_type, amount FROM cash UNION ALL SELECT value_date, payment_type, amount FROM cheque UNION ALL SELECT value_date, payment_type, amount FROM credit ORDER BY 1, 2;
